column4: hey guys do you know how i can force gdm to use a resoultion for some reason nvidia tool doesnt recognize it but when i plug a simular screen in the same computer it works then i switch the screen that doesnt work and it shows fine in 1980x1200 as well
I am not using gdm on this computer but, could you plug the smaller screen in and login
its not a smaller screen they are exactly the same heh
oh..
your best bet is in screen settings (I think thats what it is listed as)
go to system>preferences>
are you sure you have the right driver?
are they different model screens?
Oh.. could be a faulty screen?
Could you say that again?
Did you mean it does display on boot
it displays all the way just not at a decent resolution (640x480) max
but the other screen the exact same works higher?
that must be a faulty screen then!
if the other exact same screen works
it comes down to the hard ware
send it back to the shop you got it from if it still has return time left

then i dont know..
